document_data.name: ''Prize of the Ocean Strider''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Prize of the Ocean Strider''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[scimitar]] of [[fey]] origins from the [[Nelanther Isles]] off the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Prize'' possessed a ''+1'' enchantment and beast additional slashing damage upon a successful strike. The magics of the weapons made it only usable by [[druid]]s.
document_data.History: According to folk tales from the Nelanther Isles, the ''Prize of the Ocean Strider'' once belonged to a powerful [[ocean strider|Ocean Strider]] fey being. One cunning druid named [[Sarian Badgerriver]] was said to have outwitted the fey and was rewarded with this enchanted blade. If the story was true, it took place long before the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], multiple copies of the ''Prize'' existed, found in various hands across the Nelanther Isles and [[Spindrift Town]].
